attributes.long-description:
In Super Stardust™ HD, your mission is simple: destroy everything in sight! Visit different planets and fend off giant asteroids and waves of enemies by utilizing three upgradeable weapons to save the solar system from total annihilation.

This bundle includes the hit game plus the Solo and Team add-ons, all together at a discounted price. The full game features five planets to save, intense 1080p HD graphics, online rankings and Trophy support. The Solo add-on introduces three new game modes - Endless, Survival and Time Attack - plus remixed music tracks and revamped visuals. The Team Pack add-on features split-screen versus and co-op modes. Co-op mode allows two players to play through the game cooperatively, while versus multiplayer allows up to 4-player split-screen competition in modes such as Deathmatch and King of the Hill. The Team Pack also features a Ship Editor feature that allows players to customize their spacecraft, as well as enhanced visual effects.

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service).

attributes.name: Super Stardust™ HD Game Bundle
